text: The 1972-73 Austrian Cup was Austria's nationwide football cup competition. SK Rapid Wien were the defending champions. From the quarter-finals onwards, two legs were played.Austria Soccer ==First round== First round with teams from the Second League. == Round of 32== First round with teams from the first league. == Round of 16== == Quarter-finals == *First leg *Second leg *First leg *Second leg *First leg *Second leg *First leg *Second leg *First leg *Second leg ==Semi-finals == *First leg *Second leg *First leg *Second leg == Final first leg== SSW Innsbruck: Friedrich Koncilia – Werner Kriess, Engelbert Kordesch, Johann Eigenstiller, Walter Skocik, Kurt Jara, Roland Hattenberger, Manfred Gombasch, Ove Flindt-Bjerg (42. Günther Rinker), Wolfgang Breuer, Hans Rebele coach:Robert Gebhardt SK Rapid Wien: Adolf Antrich – Günter Scheffl, Norbert Hof, Erich Fak, Peter Werner, Werner Walzer, Karl Ritter, Bernd Lorenz, Hans Krankl, Herbert Gronen, Geza Gallos coach: Ernst Hložek == Final second leg== SK Rapid Wien: Adolf Antrich – Günter Scheffl (46. Egon Pajenk), Norbert Hof, Erich Fak, Peter Werner, Werner Walzer, Karl Ritter, Bernd Lorenz, Hans Krankl, Herbert Gronen (70. Stanislaus Kastner), Geza Gallos coach: Ernst Hložek SSW Innsbruck: Friedrich Koncilia – Werner Kriess (81. Günther Rinker), Engelbert Kordesch, Johann Eigenstiller, Walter Skocik, Kurt Jara, Roland Hattenberger, Manfred Gombasch, Ove Flindt-Bjerg, Wolfgang Breuer, Hans Rebele coach:Robert Gebhardt == Final second leg== *SK Rapid Wien: Adolf Antrich – Ewald Ullmann, Günter Scheffl (105. Karl Müller), Egon Pajenk, Norbert Hof, Werner Walzer, Alois Jagodic, Rudolf Flögel, Bernd Lorenz, Clemens Kos (6. Jürgen Ey), Stanislaus Kastner coach Ernst Hložek * Wiener Sport-Club: Gerald Fuchsbichler – Anton Auer, Helmut Wallner, Stefan Vasgyura, Roland Gareis, Anton Wustinger, Herbert Onger (96. Ferdinand Janotka), Anton Herzog, Günther Happich, Günther Rinker, Johann Hörmayer coach: Josef Argauer ==Top scorer== Rank Player Club Goals 1 Bernd Lorenz SK Rapid Wien 8 1 Geza Gallos SK Rapid Wien 8 2 Hans Krankl SK Rapid Wien 6 transfermarkt.at Torschützen (German) == References == Category:Austrian Cup Category:1970s in Austria
title: 1972–73 Austrian Cup
